message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.NE. 

This paper is about Information Extraction (IE) using a novel framework called QA4IE, which leverages question answering approaches. The paper discusses the limitations of existing IE solutions and proposes a new framework that can handle cross-sentence tuples and informal relation specifications. This topic falls under several sub-categories of arXiv CS, including Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE).
